name: Accelerate
description: Sharply increase your speed.

name: Aim
description: Take a moment to focus your aim on the target. Your next move will not miss them.

name: Bait
description: Trick your opponents into using their moves on you, if able, instead of their original target.

name: Barter
description: Convince the target to trade items with you.

name: Battle Horn
description: Raise your Melee Attack and Melee Defense. The first time you use it, it will cure the status aliments of all Loomians on the field.

name: Bequeath
description: Accept your fate, and instantly faint, bestowing upon your replacement all of your stat changes. This move tends to go last.

name: Body Slam
description: Crash into your opponent with a full-body tackle.

name: Brace
description: Stiffen all the muscles in your body to raise your Melee Defense.

name: Chase Down
description: Follow your target and perform an attack. If they attempt to retreat this turn, you will strike first with 1.5x the strength.

name: Dawdle
description: Play around bashfully, causing your opponent(s) to let their guard down and lower their Melee Defense.

name: Daydream
description: Get lost in thought. This move does nothing to help with the battle.

name: Dissonant Chord
description: Play a loud, harsh sound that damages the foe and prevents them from falling asleep.

name: Dodge
description: Prepare to dodge any attacks that come at you this turn. May fail if used consecutively.

name: Drudge
description: Push yourself to perform better, boosting your Melee Attack and Speed.

name: Ear Slap
description: With large ears, slap the target back and forth two to five times in a row.

name: Eerie Stare
description: Spook the foe with a stare that lowers their Melee Defense and Speed.

name: Eerie Stare
description: Spook the foe with a stare that lowers their Melee Defense and Speed.

name: Examine
description: Watch your opponent to discover their weak point. Your next move is guaranteed to be critical.

name: Give Up
description: The user deals damage, then faints.

name: Gnaw
description: Bite the target with a small amount of force.

name: Growl
description: Declare your hostility to your opponent(s) with an angry growl, lowering their Melee Attack.

name: Harmonious Chord
description: Play a delightful tone that damages the foe a little, and may put them to sleep.

name: Headbutt
description: Charge into the opponent. May also lower their speed.

name: Hight-Pitch Screech
description: May leave the opponent dazed.

name: Ill Will
description: Spitefully strike the opponent. Power is doubled when you are inflicted with a status ailment.

name: Nab
description: A close-up attack. If the target is equipped with an edible item, take it and consume it.

name: Pounce
description: Unexpectedly dash into the target.

name: Power Focus
description: Focus on your strengths, boosting your Melee Attack and Ranged Attack.

name: Quick Pounce
description: Lunge into the foe before they are ready to move.

name: Raging Howl
description: Roar furiously to deal massive damage to the opponent, but also damages yourself.

name: Raging Tackle
description: Recklessly slam into the opponent, damaging yourself some in the process.

name: Rainbow Blast
description: Fire a rainbow beam at the opponent.

name: Recycle
description: Pick up an equipped item that you previously used during this battle and re-equip it.

name: Rejuvenate
description: Focus your energy on your own well-being to restore half of your Health.

name: Repeating Tune
description: Repeat the same musical notes, damaging the target two to three times.

name: Resonate
description: Produce an amplified sound that damages the target, and may boost your Ranged Attack.

name: Scapegoat
description: At the cost of one quarter of your Health, throw out a decoy that the opponent must attack instead of you.

name: Slash
description: Hack at the opponent with sharp claws. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Slumber
description: Sleep for 3 turns. Each turn, recover 1/3 Health and 1/4 Energy.

name: Spare
description: Strike the foe, but leave them with at least one Health Point.

name: Spit
description: A damaging move that also lowers the target's Ranged Defense.

name: Spit Out
description: Chew up your equipped item and spit it at the foe. Certain item may change the type of this move.

name: Sqawk
description: Screech at the foe, lowering their Melee Defense.

name: Stampede
description: Gather your remaining allies and trample the foe. This move's Strength is based on the sum of your team's Base Melee Attack stats.

name: Stare
description: Stare intimidatingly at the opponent(s), lowering their Melee Defense.

name: Stretch
description: Stretch your muscles to be better prepared to move.

name: Strike
description: Hit the target with tail, paw, wing etc.

name: Summon
description: Use a random one of your allies' moves.

name: Swipe
description: The user swipes the target with its sharp claws.

name: Tail Slap
description: Slap the target with your tail.

name: Tear Down
description: Dismantle obstacles and enchantments from both sides of the field.

name: Tone Barrier
description: Protect yourself with a wall of inaudible sound waves. Ranged moves targeting you will cause a reverberation, damaging their user. May fail if used consecutively.

name: Tribute
description: Sacrifice your remaining Health to harshly lower the target's Melee Attack and Ranged Attack.

name: Blaze Chomp
description: Bite the foe with fiery fangs. The target may flinch or be left with a burn.

name: Blaze Punch
description: Punch the foe with fiery fists. The target may become dazed or be left with a burn.

name: Burn Up
description: Kindle your flames to raise your Ranged Attack and burn traps placed on your side of the field.

name: Fiery Fondant
description: Coat yourself in a layer of fondant and recklessly charge into the opponent. This will also boost your Melee Defense and damage yourself some in the process.

name: Fire Breath
description: Breath fire on your foe. This may also burn them.

name: Fire Slam
description: Shroud yourself in fire and charge into the target. May also burn the target.

name: Flaming Kick
description: Launch yourself toward your opponent with a fiery kick. Lands critical hits more often. May also burn the target.

name: Heat Wave
description: Summon a smoldering heat wave that lasts a few turns.

name: Kindled Rage
description: This move's Strength is doubled if you have already taken damage from another Loomian's move within the same turn.

name: Lava Smash
description: Hack at the opponent with sharp claws. Lands critical hits more often. May leave the target with a burn.

name: Magma Block
description: Protect yourself by creating a wall of magma that will hurt any Loomians who attempt to make contact with you this turn. May fail if used consecutively.

name: Phoenix Flame
description: Deplete all your remaining energy, and restore that much health. If ≥ 25% Energy was used, stat drops are cleared. If ≥ 50% Energy was used, status ailments are cleared.

name: Pyrokinesis
description: Scorch the foe with flames created by your mind alone. This may burn them.

name: Raging Flame
description: Burn the target with a blazing hot ball of fire.

name: Rapid Fire
description: Launch three fireballs at the target, each having a small chance to burn them.

name: Singe
description: Fires small flames at the target, possibly leaving it with a burn.

name: Aqua Jaws
description: Bite down hard on the foe. This also lowers their Melee Defense.

name: Douse
description: Splash the target with a deluge of water. If targeting a foe, a harsh torrent will hurt them; if targeting an ally, cleansing water will soothe and heal them.

name: Downpour
description: Drench the battlefield with heavy rainfall for a few turns.

name: Geyser
description: Unleash a blast of hot water and steam that has a chance to burn your target.

name: Hydro Slash
description: Hack at the opponent with sharp claws. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Maroon
description: Wash the opponent away with an overwhelming amount of water. Drains a small amount of their Energy.

name: Marsh Wave
description: Send a wave of swamp water crashing into nearby opponents. This also lowers their Ranged Defense.

name: Piercing Drive
description: Ram head on into the foe with a sharp horn, bypassing their fortifications.

name: Plunge
description: Dive deep below the surface and hide for a turn. Strike the target on the second turn.

name: Soft Water
description: Begin cleansing yourself of impurities, recovering one eighth of your Health at the end of each turn.

name: Spray
description: Shoot a stream of water at the target.

name: Submerge
description: Dive below the surface and hide there for a turn. Strike the target on the second turn, bypassing their fortifications.

name: Tsunami
description: Attack all surrounding Loomians by crashing a large wave in the battlefield.

name: Vicious Snap
description: Attack the target with a cruel bite, and cause their next move to cost 25% more energy.

name: Water Bomb
description: Hurl a ball of water that explodes on contact. May leave the target dazed.

name: Wave Wrecker
description: Thrash the opponent with a heavy sea wave. May leave them dazed.

name: Briar Block
description: Protect yourself by growing a thorny barrier that also hurts Loomians whose moves attempt to touch you this turn. May fail if used consecutively.

name: Bush Whack
description: Surprise the opponent by ambushing them with uprooted shrubbery. This may cause them to flinch.

name: Coconut Bomb
description: Recklessly dunk on the opponent with an explosive coconut, damaging yourself some in the process. This may leave the opponent with a burn.

name: Fungus Curse
description: Cast a spell that temporarily swaps the effectiveness of Light- and Dark-type moves against all Plant-type Loomians in battle.

name: Harvest
description: Feed the target to help them recover health.

name: Leaf Barrage
description: Blast the target with sharp leaves. May lower the target's Melee Defense.

name: Life Drain
description: Drain the target's Health, and restore half of that to yourself.

name: Nature's Force
description: Draw power from nature and fire it at the target. May also lower the target's Ranged Defense.

name: Nature's Rage
description: Recklessly unleash your fury on an opponent for a few turns. When finished, you will become dazed.

name: Petal Pummel
description: Pelt the target with flower petals.

name: Photosynthesis
description: Convert sunlight into nutrients to restore your Health.

name: Pine Shot
description: Shoot pine needles at the foe two to five times in a row.

name: Sap Plant
description: Plant a special flower that slowly saps the foe's Health and restores it to you.

name: Snore Spores
description: Put the foe to sleep with a cloud of sleep-inducing spores.

name: Static Spores
description: Paralyze the foe with a cloud of statically charged spores.

name: Take Root
description: Implant your roots in the ground to slowly regain Health each turn. This prevents you from leaving the fight.

name: Thistle Slash
description: Hack at the target with prickly claws. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Thorn Slam
description: A hard hitting attack that lowers your Melee Attack after use.

name: Timber Thrash
description: Recklessly clobber the opponent, damaging yourself some in the process.

name: Trip Root
description: Set a trip wire made from tree root and trip the foe. More powerful against heavier targets.

name: Wonder Herb
description: Administer a special herb to your allied Loomians, both on and off the field, which cleanses them of their status ailments.

name: Blindspot Batter
description: Blind the target and attack from behind, bypassing their fortifications.

name: Dazzling Barrage
description: Strike the foe two to five times.

name: Disperse
description: Split light into multiple beams to boost your Ranged Attack and Accuracy.

name: Energy Surge
description: Radiate a huge wave of energy that damages opponents and fills your allies with Energy.

name: Flash
description: Daze the foe with a quick flash of blinding light.

name: Flash 'n Flee
description: Blast the opponent with blinding light, and then retreat from battle to allow an ally to take your place.

name: Flash Pulse
description: Create a pulsing wave of light that hurts your opponent(s) and may leave them dazed.

name: Gamma Pulse
description: Emit a pulse of harsh light rays from beyond the visible spectrum that damage your opponents.

name: Light Dash
description: Tackle the foe at nearly the speed of light. This move always goes first.

name: Lightspeed Ray
description: Swiftly cast an attack on the foe. This move tends to go first.

name: Luminous Roar
description: Blast the foe with blinding light from your mouth that also prevents them from using Dark-type moves for two turns.

name: Luster Loot
description: Steal light from the opponent's soul, draining their Health and restoring some to yourself.

name: Magnify
description: Intensify your power and focus to greatly boost your Ranged Attack.

name: Nova Blast
description: Bring the bursting light of a nearby star crashing down onto your opponent. May reduce their Ranged Attack.

name: Radiant Forecast
description: Foresee bright, intense sunlight that showers the opponent two turns later.

name: Shine
description: Damage the foe with bright light.

name: Baffle
description: Surprise the foe with an unexpected gesture, reducing their Speed, then retreat to allow an ally to take your place.

name: Bag of Tricks
description: Use a random move.

name: Bamboozle
description: Tricks your opponent into letting their guard down, then attack when they least expect it. This attack almost never misses.

name: Blood Drain
description: Bite down on the foe and begin to slowly leech away their life each turn.

name: Charade
description: Fool your opponent into thinking you are in distress, harshly lowering their Ranged Defense.

name: Chomp
description: Bite the opponent with sharp fangs. May also make them flinch.

name: Dark Surge
description: Emanate a dark, cruel wave of despair that damages your opponent and may cause them to flinch.

name: Dive Bomb
description: Strike the foe from above. May also knock their item off.

name: Egg Lob
description: Throw a loaded egg into the air. After a few turns, the egg will land on the foe and explode. This will damage them and lower one of their stats randomly.

name: Egg Storm
description: Bombard your foes with a shower of exploding eggs. This may leave them dazed.

name: Gain Drain
description: Absorb the target's raised and lowered stats as Health. Absorbing more lowered stats than raised will instead hurt you.

name: Gloom Fangs
description: Bite down on the foe and swallow all the light in their soul. They cannot use Light-type moves for two turns.

name: Gnarly Gash
description: Slash the opponent with sharp claws. May lower the target's Melee Defense.

name: Mega Chomp
description: Bite the opponent with a powerful jaw and sharp fangs. May also make them flinch.

name: Pilfer
description: Strike the foe and, if not holding anything yourself, steal their item.

name: Provoke
description: Aggravate the opponent. They will become too angry to use Support Moves for three turns.

name: Rant
description: Shout in anger, damaging your opponents and reducing their Ranged Attack.

name: Sharpen
description: Sharpen your claws to boost your Melee Attack and Accuracy.

name: Slap Down
description: Hit the opponent. If they are holding an item, slap it to the ground. The item can no longer be used.

name: Soul Drain
description: Stare into the target's soul, draining their Health by extracting their happy thoughts and memories, and restore half of the stolen health to yourself.

name: Spite
description: When hit by this cruel curse, the target will instantly lose half of their current Health.

name: Square One
description: All Loomians in battle reset their stat buffs and debuffs.

name: Talent Trade
description: Swap Abilities with the target.

name: Tricky Tactics
description: A skilled attack which uses the foe's own Melee Attack stat against them.

name: Tease
description: Makes the opponent feel self-conscious about the moves they use, preventing them from using the same move two turns in a row.

name: Brain Freeze
description: Scourge the opponent with a painfully cold stimulus. This move is super effective on Mind-type Loomians.

name: Chilly Chomp
description: Bite the foe with ice-cold fangs. The target may flinch or begin freezing.

name: Deep Freeze
description: An extremely frigid attack that is super-effective on Water-type Loomians.

name: Flurry
description: Drop a flurry of snow on your opponents. This may cause them to begin freezing.

name: Frost Beam
description: Shoot the foe with frozen shards. This may cause them to begin freezing.

name: Frost Punch
description: Punch the foe with an ice-cold fist. The target may become dazed or begin freezing.

name: Ice Hammer
description: Clobber the foe with a larger hammer made from ice.

name: Icicle Trap
description: Suspend sharp icicles in the air on the opponents' side of the battlefield. When your opponent switches Loomians into battle, they will be damaged by the trap.

name: Out of Order
description: Blast the foe with a sticky, chilled (but disappointingly, not frozen) goop. Cannot be used two turns in a row.

name: Peppermint Breath
description: Exhale a gust of minty, ice-cold breath on the foe that may cause them to begin freezing or leave them with a burn.

name: Sleet Shot
description: Shoot shivering sleet at the opponent. May lower their Speed.

name: Snot Shot
description: Fire freezing phlegm, facing the foe. Freezes infrequently.

name: Snowdozer
description: Pack yourself into a ball of snow and roll over the opponent five turns in a row. Pick up more snow each time, increasing damage.

name: Winter's Fury
description: Unleash two to three punches on the foe. A small amount of the damage you deal is returned to you as Energy.

name: Electroburst
description: Blast the foe with high voltage. This may leave them paralyzed or with an electrical burn.

name: Electro Punch
description: Punch the foe with an electrified fist. The target may become dazed or paralyzed.

name: Energize
description: Build up electric charge to boost your Ranged Attack and Ranged Defense.

name: Jolt
description: Give the opponent a quick shock before they are able to move.

name: Jump Start
description: Give you and your allies a jolt of electricity that greatly boosts each of your Ranged Attack at the cost of 1/4 of your max Health.

name: Power Draw
description: 20% of the damage dealt to the foe is restored to you as Energy.

name: Power Siphon
description: Attack the foe and begin draining a little of their Energy each turn.

name: Precision Bolt
description: Zap the opponent with perfect accuracy. This attack almost never misses.

name: Static Shock
description: Shock the opponent with a small voltage, sometimes leaving them paralyzed.

name: Storm Summon
description: Summons a great storm which hits everything around you. This move also has a good chance of paralyzing whatever it hits.

name: Tase
description: Stun the enemy with a small jolt that always leaves them with paralysis.

name: Thunder Chomp
description: Bite the opponent with high voltage fangs. This may cause them to flinch or become paralyzed.

name: Thunder Clap
description: Bite the opponent with high voltage fangs. This may cause them to flinch or become paralyzed.

name: Thunder Crash
description: Electrify yourself and recklessly charge into your foe. You are damaged some in return.

name: Thunder Slam
description: While electrified, hurl yourself into your opponent. This may paralyze them.

name: Thunderstrike
description: Blast the target with a powerful bolt of electricity. This may paralyze them.

name: Zip-Zap
description: Zap the opponent, and then retreat from battle to allow an ally to take your place.

name: Air Blade
description: Slash your opponent with a rapid air current. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Air Whip
description: Whiplash your foes as you fly past them at high speed. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Cyclone Slam
description: Ride a storm and crash into the opponent. Almost never misses.

name: Gale Force
description: Whip up strong gusts of wind that sweep the battlefield for a few turns.

name: Gust
description: Kick up a burst of wind to boost your Speed and clear obstacles which the foe has placed on your side of the arena.

name: Jet Stream
description: Batter the foe with turbulent gusts. This may also lower their speed.

name: Nosedive
description: Plummet straight down from high above the target and crash into them, taking some damage yourself.

name: Peck
description: Swoop through the air and strike the target with a sharp beak.

name: Perch
description: Land and rest, restoring half of your maximum Health.

name: Scavenge
description: Swoop down and strike the foe. May steal their item.

name: Second Wind
description: If your Energy is at or below 10 points, fully restores Energy.

name: Tempest
description: This move's Strength is based on how much faster you are than your opponent.

name: Wing Slap
description: Slap the foe with your wing.

name: Battering Ram
description: Use your armor to slam into the foe. Damage is based on your Melee Defense rather than Attack. May lower the foe's Melee Defense.

name: Bug Bite
description: Restore half of the Health that you drain from the target.

name: Clamp Claw
description: Clamp down on the opponent, drain their Health, and convert it into Energy for yourself.

name: Double String
description: Sting the target twice consecutively, possibly infecting it with poison.

name: Molt
description: Shed a layer of skin to sharply increase your Speed.

name: Mystic Breeze
description: Kicks up a strange wind that batters the opponent. This may also boost your Speed.

name: Parasitize
description: Leech away the target's Health, and restore half to yourself.

name: Pester
description: Swarm your opponents, inflicting damage and lowering their Ranged Attack.

name: Pestilence
description: Swarm the target, damaging them for four to five turns and preventing them from escaping the fight.

name: Pheroblast
description: Launch a cloud of pheromones at the target. If targeting the foe, harsh chemicals will be used. If an ally, helpful chemicals will heal them.

name: Twirly Whirl
description: Perform a mesmerizing dance before attacking the foe. This may cause them to become dazed.

name: Web Shot
description: Shoot web at the opponent to bind them up and lower their Speed.

name: Boulder Blast
description: Hurl boulders at the foe two to five times in a row.

name: Burrow
description: Dig slightly into the ground to raise your defense.

name: Clay Slap
description: Whack the target with a sticky limb. This also lowers their Speed.

name: Earthquake
description: Strike the ground with seismic force, causing a local earthquake that clobbers all surrounding Loomians in battle.

name: Landslide
description: Hits all Loomians surrounding the user.

name: Muck Buck
description: Roll in mud, then run around in a rampage, crashing into all adjacent Loomians while also dealing a small amount of damage to yourself.

name: Mud Spatter
description: Fling thick mud at the foe, damaging them and lowering their speed.

name: Mudslide
description: Swamp the target with a mudflow, which also clears obstacles from your side of the arena along its way.

name: Quicksand
description: Trap the foe in quicksand, preventing them from retreating from battle and hurting them slowly over time.

name: Tamp
description: Pack your body in more tightly to increase your defenses.

name: Yeti's Wrath
description: Recklessly unleash your fury on an opponent for a few turns. When finished, you will become dazed.

name: Baneful Bash
description: Whack the opponent, possibly infecting them with poison.

name: Canister Burst
description: Launch 2-3 paint canisters at the target.

name: Corrode
description: Drop a corrosive substance on your opponents. This may also lower their Ranged Defense.

name: Gobble Goop
description: Attack the foe with biohazardous waste. May leave them infected with poison. Drains some of their Energy.

name: Graffiti
description: Spray toxic paint all over the opponents. This may poison them.

name: Muck Blast
description: Launch a ball of filthy debris at the opponent. This may poison them.

name: Oil Leak
description: Spill some oil on the opponent to lower their speed.

name: Paint Shower
description: Blast your foes with colorful paint. Your Ranged Attack drops after using this move.

name: Poison
description: Inflict the target with a toxicant that becomes more potent over time.

name: Poison Barbs
description: Scatter poisonous barbs at the feet of your foes. Loomians entering battle on their side will become poisoned.

name: Slime
description: Launch slime at the foe. This may poison them.

name: Sting
description: Strike the foe with a stinger, possibly infecting them with poison.

name: Toxiblast
description: An explosive move that may leave the foe poisoned.

name: Toxic Spores
description: Poison the foe with a cloud of toxic spores.

name: Toxic Tail
description: Strike the target with your tail, possibly poisoning them. Land critical hits more often.

name: Venom Chomp
description: Bite the foe with venomous fangs. May cause them to flinch or infect them with a toxicant that gets more potent with time.

name: Armor Down
description: Remove your Metal typing to greatly increase your Speed.

name: Barbs
description: Spread sharp obstacles on the opponent's side of the field which cause damage to them as they enter battle.

name: Bash
description: Tackle the foe.

name: Clamp
description: Pinch the foe.

name: Complete Demolition
description: Attempt to completely destroy the foe. On your next turn, you will be too exhausted to move.

name: Dart Burst
description: Fire 2-3 darts at the opponent. This may leave them dazed.

name: Double Whack
description: Strike the opponent using a tool in each hand. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Heavy Bash
description: Ram full-force into the opponent.

name: Holy Slash
description: Slash the target with a sword imbued with light. Super effective against Dark-type opponents.

name: Metal Blast
description: Launch a large chunk of metal at the opponent.

name: Metal Shriek
description: Produce an awful, high pitched sound by rubbing pieces of metal against each other, lowering the opponent's Melee and Ranged defenses.

name: Metal Swipes
description: Swipe at the foe with metal claws. Hits twice.

name: Reflection Burst
description: If you have already been hit by an opponent move this turn, this move's Strength is doubled.

name: Searing Steel
description: Strike the target with a hot plate of steel. Ignores Water's resistance to Metal. May burn the target.

name: Steel Crusher
description: Crush the target with incredible force. May also boost your Melee Attack.

name: Steel Trap
description: Trap your opponent on the field, preventing them from retreating from the fight.

name: Tune-up
description: Recalibrate your sensors to increase your Ranged Defense.

name: Ancient Instinct
description: Randomly boost either Melee Attack or Speed by two stages.

name: Ancient Roar
description: Threaten the foe with a fierce roar that lowers their Melee and Ranged Attack, then retreat to allow another Loomian on your team to take your place.

name: Bane of Haste
description: Cast an ancient spell to cause the slowest to move first, and the quickest to move last. Lasts 5 turns.

name: Beast's Slumber
description: Sleep for 3 turns. Each turn, recover 1/3 Health and 1/4 Energy. Defenses are boosted until you wake up.

name: Confound
description: Launch a small object targeted at the foe's head that does some damage, and may leave them dazed.

name: Dino Claws
description: Swipe at the foe with sharp claws. May also make them flinch.

name: Draco Beam
description: Bombard the opponent with a burst of ancient energy using all your might. This will harshly lower your Ranged Attack.

name: Elemental Burst
description: Blast the foe with the basic elements. They may become burned, paralyzed, or begin freezing.

name: Meteor Crash
description: Crash meteors down upon your opponents.

name: Meteor Smash
description: Strike down on your opponents with meteors.

name: Outburst
description: The Strength of this move scales based on how much Energy the user has. 20% of the damage dealt by this attack is recovered as Energy.

name: Primal Slash
description: Swipe at the target with claws. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Savage Greed
description: A savage attack. If used on an ally, you will completely knock them out in order to boost your own Melee Attack. The more Health they had, the better the boost.

name: Shrewd Blast
description: Predicting your target's next movements, launch a blast that almost never misses. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Apparition
description: Disappear without a trace. On the next turn, reappear suddenly and strike the foe with explosive light orbs. Super effective against Dark-type opponents.

name: Emulate
description: Turn yourself into a copy of your opponent.

name: Fade Away
description: Strike the opponent and then disappear, allowing an ally to take your place.

name: Fade Away
description: Strike the opponent and then disappear, allowing an ally to take your place.

name: Final Ruse
description: Prepare for the worst, readying yourself to take your opponent down if you are knocked out before your next turn.

name: Ghostly Howl
description: Release a spine-chilling howl that damages the opponent, bypassing their fortifications and potentially leaving them dazed.

name: Hazy Shroud
description: Engulf the battlefield in a thick fog for a few turns.

name: Impersonate
description: Impersonate the target. If they are about to use a damaging move, use that same move on them. This move tends to go first.

name: Oppress
description: Relentlessly pester the foe. Deals more damage if the target is afflicted with a status ailment.

name: Phantom Slash
description: Relentlessly pester the foe. Deals more damage if the target is afflicted with a status ailment.Swipe at the target with spectral claws. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Revival
description: Recover half of your Health and temporarily void your Spirit typing.

name: Shadow Sprint
description: Dart at the target through the shadows and attack unexpectedly. This move goes first.

name: Soul Harvest
description: Get a sharp Melee Attack boost when you knock out another Loomian using this move.

name: Soul Storm
description: Raid the opponent with a barrage of spectral strikes. Knocks down protective enchantments.

name: Spectral Burst
description: Launch a beam of ghostly energy at the target. May lower the foe's Ranged Defense.

name: Startle
description: Strike the opponent when they don't expect it. May cause them to flinch.

name: Stupefy
description: Scare the foe, potentially inducing paralysis.

name: Bludgeon
description: Whack your opponent with a blunt object. This may also lower their Melee Defense.

name: Body Crash
description: Hurl your entire body at the foe. Damage is based on your Melee Defense rather than Attack.

name: Boom Bash
description: From a distance, punch or kick hard to direct a shock wave at the foe. This may leave them dazed.

name: Brawn Boost
description: Sharply boost your Melee Attack.

name: Buck Up
description: Get hyped up for the fight. Increases your critical hit rate.

name: Bulk Up
description: Bulk up to boost your Melee Attack and Melee Defense.

name: Chop
description: Chop the opponent. This may cause them to flinch.

name: Clawber
description: Recklessly clobber your foe with a rugged claw, hurting yourself a bit in the process.

name: Counter Stance
description: Counter the opponent's attack before they are able to strike. This move fails if the opponent is not preparing to attack you this turn.

name: Driving Force
description: Slam into the opponent and push them back, forcing them to retreat if able.

name: Heart Break
description: Strike the opponent in the heart. There is a good chance this will leave them dazed.

name: Hop Kick
description: Hop into the air and land with a kick on the target. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Horn-Dashi
description: Use your horn to push the opponent backwards, potentially forcing them out of the battle.

name: Junglejutsu
description: Pulverize the opponent with a calculated blow. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Mega Kick
description: Launch yourself forward towards your opponent with a powerful kick. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Mega Punch
description: Hit the target hard with a fist. This may leave them dazed.

name: Pep Jab
description: Punch the foe with a special technique which allows 20% of the damage you deal to the foe to be restored to you as Energy.

name: Punch
description: Whack the target with a closed fist. This may leave them dazed.

name: Quick Punch
description: Throws a punch faster than your opponent can react. This move tends to go first.

name: Rogue Assault
description: Engage in risky, close-up conflict with the foe. This deals a great amount of damage but also lowers your defenses.

name: Rough Up
description: Seize the foe and shake them violently. This move's strength is slightly boosted if the foe is shorter than you.

name: Swat
description: Smack the foe.

name: Brainwash
description: Fill the target's mind with disorienting imagery. May leave the target dazed.

name: Cerebral Slash
description: Swipe at the target with metaphysical claws. Lands critical hits more often.

name: Deja Vu
description: Force the target into a mental loop, repeating the last move they used several times.

name: Empathize
description: Share pain with your target. Health will be evenly distributed between you.

name: Energy Gift
description: Sacrifice your remaining Health to fully replenish the Energy of the Loomian that takes your place.

name: Flabbergast
description: Attack the opponent's mind by telepathically flooding it with confusing ideas and imagery. Has a small chance to lower their Ranged Attack.

name: Foul Chant
description: Cast a foul curse upon your foe. This may also leave them inflicted with a random status ailment.

name: Health Gift
description: Sacrifice your remaining Health to fully replenish the Health of the Loomian that takes your place.

name: Hypnotize
description: Lull the target away into a deep slumber.

name: Memorize
description: Learn how to use the last move executed by the target.

name: Mind's Eye
description: Hone your senses to boost your Ranged Attack.

name: Peace of Mind
description: Seek mental serenity to boost your Ranged Attack and Ranged Defense.

name: Psychal Slap
description: Swat at the opponent from a distance, while using your mind to summon a larger, metaphysical copy of your hand to strike the opponent. This attack deals damage based on your Melee Attack, and the opponent's Ranged Defense.

name: Psycho Blast
description: Strike the target with a fierce mental blast. This may lower their Ranged Defense.

name: Return to Sender
description: Unleash an attack on the Loomian who last struck you with a Ranged move this turn, with double the power.

name: Splitting Headache
description: Deal double damage if you are inflicted with a status ailment.

name: Stratagem
description: A unique move which utilizes the user's Ranged Defense stat in place of its Attack.

name: Telekinetic Sweep
description: Swipe low at your foes with a metaphysical slap. If hit, this might leave them dazed.

name: Adaptive Assault
description: The type and effect of this move varies with the evolutionary strengths of the Loomian that uses it.

name: Gloominous Roar
description: When used by Tiklipse, this move becomes the same type(s) as it.
